name: Sofortgmbh
description: At Romanian Invest, we specialize in supporting startups in Romania from the ground up. We’re more than just a business formation agency – we’re your strategic partner throughout the entire journey. We help entrepreneurs establish their Romanian companies quickly and efficiently, navigating all legal and administrative steps with ease. But our support doesn’t stop there. If you have a promising idea, we offer financial backing to help bring your vision to life. Our focus is primarily on the IT and AI sectors, but we are open to investing in other innovative fields as well. We believe in the power of bold ideas and ambitious founders. In exchange for our investments, we usually take an equity stake in the company, aligning our success with yours. With our local expertise, professional network, and capital support, we empower startups to grow, scale, and succeed in the Romanian and international markets. Let’s build the future – together.
investmentAreas: IT, AI, Construction

name: Smart Impact Capital
description: We are an enthusiastic, professional team of investors and subject matter experts with diverse expertise in business. We invest in CEE region, at early and very early stages, small tickets 10-100k. We impact businesses with a solid social or environmental return. We accelerate you & prepare to series A.
investmentAreas: Digital Health, Crowdfunding, B2B software, Fintech

name: Hellen’s Rock Capital
description: Hellen's Rock is a single family office with diversified assets under management. Its venture capital fund partners with innovative doers and thinkers who have the know-how and vision to build game-changing companies. Our investments are driven by the overarching goal of inspiring and improving the lives of current and future generations. We support people who share our goal of exploring new ideas to build a more connected world - a world where everyone has access to wellbeing, education, finance and entertainment. Our Founder, Sacha Dragic, is a serial entrepreneur from CEE who gained valuable experience in launching a wide range of initiatives before founding the Superbet Group - a European market-leading multi-billion business that attracted one of the world's largest private equity funds - the Blackstone Group - to invest €175 million to accelerate Superbet's global business expansion.
investmentAreas: Media & Entertainment, Health & Wellbeing, Fintech

name: Netopia Ventures
description: Netopia Ventures provides venture capital to game changers and disruptors. The company focuses on platform-driven ecosystems that are e-tail and fintech-centric and generate network effects with scalability at the regional level.
investmentAreas: Finance, FinTech, Venture Capital, Innovation
fundingStage: Pre-Seed / Seed, Series A/B, Series C & Beyond

name: Broadcast Content Fund
description: The Broadcast Content Fund aims to help the sustainable growth of Scotland’s broadcast production sector, encouraging the development of new projects, the scaling up of already successful activities and the production of commissioned programmes. The Fund has an allocation of £3m for the period 2018/19 and will prioritise projects which have the potential to generate lasting benefits to build companies of scale, reflect or promote Scottish culture, creativity and diversity, as well as projects which offer significant opportunities to people currently under-represented in the screen sector.
investmentAreas: Financial Services, Movies, Videos, Sound, Funding

name: Banca Transilvania
description: Banca Transilvania (BT) is the Bank for Entrepreneurial People in Romania. BT is ranked 2nd amongst Romanian banks, in terms of assets. Banca Transilvania’s mission is to support the development of the business environment, through innovative products and services, offered with professionalism. The bank’s history began in Cluj-Napoca in 1994, at the initiative of a group of business people.
investmentAreas: Asset Management, Banking, Financial Services, Lending
fundingStage: Pre-Seed / Seed, Series A/B, Series C & Beyond

name: Arsat Group
description: Wieland Ventures is a corporate venture company and part of the Wieland Group, the world’s leading supplier of semi-finished products and components made of copper and copper alloys. The investments of Wieland Ventures support the Wieland Group’s innovation and growth strategy. The target investment areas include (e)mobility and recycling. Beyond providing growth capital, they offer startups access to the knowledge and broad market networks of Wieland.
investmentAreas: Aerospace, Automotive, Aviation, Aerospace
fundingStage: Pre-Seed / Seed, Series A/B, Series C & Beyond

name: Underline Ventures
description: Underline Ventures invests at the seed stage, including pre-seed, seed, and late seed rounds, often collaborating with other investors whom they can help founders connect with. Their average investment is €500k. The firm assists founders in defining appropriate strategies, milestones, and priorities as their companies progress from seed to Series A, while also facilitating connections with capital and talent. Prediction Capital strongly believes in founders maintaining control of their companies and aligns its interests for the long term with the entrepreneurs it backs. While subscribing to the founders' strategies, the firm also provides a valuable critical perspective to help guide decision-making and growth.
investmentAreas: Manufacturing, Dev Tools, Travel Tech, Cybersecurity, Software

name: Early Game Ventures
description: Early Game Ventures is an early-stage VC focused on identifying and investing in the best tech startups in Central and Eastern Europe, with a focus on Romania. The fund focuses on 11 themes, both B2B and B2C with special focus on Enterprise Software, Cybersecurity, Dev Tools and Ed Tech, targeting founders addressing big markets. Driven by a conviction-based approach, Early Game Ventures prefers to lead investments at Pre-Seed stage, while also investing at Seed stage and in follow-ons at Series A. Sweet spot initial ticket is €500,000 - €2 million per startup with the capacity to invest up to €6 million per company over time. The fund supports rapid globalization of its portfolio companies and provides direct in-depth advice to help founders overcome the 0 to 1 hurdles.
investmentAreas: Enterprise Software; Cybersecurity; Dev tools; Ed Tech; AI; Mobility; Agri Tech; Energy Tech; Fin Tech; Health Tech; Media & Mar Tech

name: Fortech Investments
description: Fortech Investments is an investment fund and strategic partner for early-stage start-ups in Energy, Healthcare, Manufacturing, Automotive, and FinTech. Fortech Investments focuses on early-stage startups, offering funding tickets ranging from €100,000 to €500,000 in pre-seed and seed rounds. Beyond financial support, they provide smart money and strategic assistance to their portfolio companies. As a strategic investor and partner, Fortech Investments leverages its technical and business expertise to help founders make better and quicker decisions.
investmentAreas: Automotive, EdTech, Energy, FinTech, Health Care, Manufacturing, Medical, Real Estate

name: Gecad Ventures
description: Gecad Ventures invests in start-up and expansion-phase hi-tech companies from CEE with meaningful prospects of scaling internationally, including verticals like Cybersecurity, Fintech, AI/ML, AR & VR, Transportation, IoT and Agritech.Gecad Ventures invests in start-up and expansion-phase hi-tech companies from CEE with meaningful prospects of scaling internationally, including verticals like Cybersecurity, Fintech, AI/ML, AR & VR, Transportation, IoT and Agritech.
investmentAreas: Cybersecurity, Fintech, AI/ML, AR & VR, Transportation, IoT and Agritech.

name: Leryon Holdings
description: In addition to their primary focus on real estate, manages a diverse investment portfolio that includes stocks and bonds. The firm also operates as a boutique venture capital entity, identifying high-potential startups and providing initial seed funding. They take an active role in supporting these startups, accompanying them through their early years of development and growth. This multifaceted approach allows the firm to leverage its expertise across various investment sectors, offering comprehensive support to emerging businesses while maintaining a strong presence in more traditional investment areas.
investmentAreas: AI, SaaS, Drones, DefenseTech

name: Catalyst Romania
description: Catalyst Romania Fund II focuses on tech companies that have already launched products into their target markets and have experienced management teams. During the initial investment period, the fund plans to provide between EUR 1 and 3m to 16 Romanian companies to support their growth objectives and international expansion plans. Catalyst also brings indispensable company scaling know-how, resources, business partners and co-investors from across Europe, North America and Asia. Catalyst Romania II will pursue investment opportunities in other Eastern European countries and elsewhere, as long as companies have business substance in Romania, through operations, development teams or sales.
investmentAreas: Edtech, Fintech, Ecommerce, SaaS

name: Clever Capital
description: Clever Capital is a private investment vehicle based in Cluj-Napoca, Romania that generally invests in early stage technology focused startups, including fintech and blockchain projects, and mentors them to support accelerated growth locally and internationally, as well as help them reach next investment rounds.
investmentAreas: RPA, Robotics, AI, Machine Learning, Blockchain, Crypto, Fintech

name: Brookfund
description: Brook Fund is a dynamic venture capital firm focused on nurturing high-growth startups in the UK and beyond. We provide strategic funding, expert mentorship, and industry connections to help innovative companies scale and succeed. Partner with us to transform groundbreaking ideas into thriving businesses.
investmentAreas: PropTech, EnergyTech, Hardware, Fintech, Healthcare

name: Cleverage VentureCapital
description: Cleverage Venture Capital specializes in fostering growth for innovative startups through strategic investments and expert guidance. We support visionary entrepreneurs with the resources and connections needed to scale their businesses successfully. Partner with us to turn your cutting-edge ideas into market-leading enterprises.
investmentAreas: Healthtech, MedTech, Diagnostics, Life Sciiences

name: Parachain Ventures
description: Parachain Ventures is a pioneering venture capital firm dedicated to investing in blockchain technology and Web3 innovations. We empower visionary startups with capital, mentorship, and strategic support to accelerate their growth and impact. Join us in shaping the future of the decentralized economy.
investmentAreas: Cryptocurrency, FinTech, Web3, DeFI

name: Startarium
description: Startarium is an startup incubator based in Romania. Startarium, the city of entrepreneurs, is the most complex online platform dedicated to entrepreneurs in Romania. It provides them with the necessary resources to learn how to build successful businesses, to work on their business model, to interact with experts or mentors and, last but not least, to get their business financed through access to investors and funding programs or within the Startarium PitchDay events. Startarium is an initiative of Impact Hub Bucharest and ING Bank.
investmentAreas: E-Learning Providers, Entrepreneurship, Startups, Business entrepreneurs

name: Orange Fab Romania
description: Orange Fab Romania is an acceleration program that facilitates collaboration between Orange and innovative startups. Orange is one of the world’s leading telecommunications operators with sales of 43.5 billion euros in 2022 and 136,000 employees worldwide at 31 December 2022, including 75,000 employees in France. The Group has a total customer base of 287 million customers worldwide at 31 December 2022.
investmentAreas: Telecommunications, Hardware, Digital, Fixed, Mobile

name: Spherik Accelerator
description: Spherik is an NGO founded in 2013 to advance tech entrepreneurship in Romania as an essential step towards accelerating innovation. Spherik Accelerator is an NGO based in Cluj-Napoca, that was founded in 2013 with the mission to connect startups with strategic resources. Spherik stands at the intersection between Tech, Education and Investment and reunites a community of like-minded people.
investmentAreas: Consulting, Tech, Mentorship, Workshops, Investment

name: StepFWD
description: StepFWD is a 6-weeks pre-accelerator program. Grow your prototype into a profitable business with your diverse team in our 8 weeks pre-acceleration program. Get expert advice from professionals who have a proven track record of building and supporting startups. They'll provide you with clear guidance on your next steps, necessary adjustments, and effective strategies for improvement.
investmentAreas: Finance, Financial Services, Strategic Management Services

name: Techcelerator
description: Techcelerator is a 10 weeks acceleration and funding program in Romania. Techcelerator aims to find the most creative, innovative and prolific startups and enroll them in our 10 weeks acceleration program for tech products, to help them reach market fit through a dedicated pre-seed and/or seed investment rounds. We have offices in Bucharest and Cluj Napoca, where the acceleration will happen throughout the year.
investmentAreas: Mentoring, Fundraising, SaaS, AI / ML, FinTech

name: Reaktor incubator
description: Reaktor incubator focuses specifically to accelerate the growth and innovation of early-stage EU tech firms. The internationalization platform dedicated to SEE early-stage tech startups to fast forward the validation and launching of scalable products. The need for internationalization and validation of new markets is becoming more and more understood as a process in SEE.
investmentAreas: Consulting, Product innovation, Corporate ventures, Go-to-market

name: InnovX
description: InnovX-BCR is a non-equity program dedicated to accelerating Startups and Scaleups in Central and Eastern Europe. InnovX supports innovative companies (start-ups, scale-ups, and mid-caps) with exponential growth potential. It provides top-notch entrepreneurial education, connections with global tech and service providers, exposure to the best financial mix, attracts young talents, fosters collaboration with innovation-driven corporations, and helps companies internationalize to global innovation hubs in the EU, UK, USA, Middle East, and Latin America.
investmentAreas: Assistive Technology, Biotechnology, CleanTech, E-Commerce, EdTech

name: Innovation Labs
description: Innovation Labs is a Romanian pre-accelerator for young tech founders and startups. Innovation Labs is a mentorship program for young people who want to make a difference through their creative technologies. Innovation Labs is a learning-by-doing quest to nurture your hatching idea into a tech product.
investmentAreas: IT Services, IT Consulting, Business Development, Enterprise, Incubators

name: InnovX
description: InnovX-BCR is a non-equity program dedicated to accelerating Startups and Scaleups in Central and Eastern Europe. InnovX supports innovative companies (start-ups, scale-ups, and mid-caps) with exponential growth potential. It provides top-notch entrepreneurial education, connections with global tech and service providers, exposure to the best financial mix, attracts young talents, fosters collaboration with innovation-driven corporations, and helps companies internationalize to global innovation hubs in the EU, UK, USA, Middle East, and Latin America.
investmentAreas: Assistive Technology, Biotechnology, CleanTech, E-Commerce, EdTech

name: Carbon
description: Carbon is a business incubator that focuses on video game development. Applying to our incubator may get you the chance to get a maximum of 50,000$ in cash as well as getting a large range of support services (mentorship from industry veterans, quality assurance, analytics, customer support, development services, publishing, PR&Marketing, sponsorships). We can put you in contact with publishers, platform holders and other service providers, who can contribute to making your game a success.
investmentAreas: Computer Games, Marketing, Analytics, Customer support, Development services

name: Afaceri Sociale
description: Afaceri Sociale is a social economic foundation dedicated to helping social entrepreneurs form social ventures. A very useful overview of the Work Integration Social Enterprises sector in Romania. Unfolds is a sustainability documentary series that educates and promotes inspiring sustainable programmes.
investmentAreas: Investment, Entrepreneurs, Economy, Social Enterprises

name: Sparking Capital
description: We back early stage founders with unique industry insights, powerful vision, passion, courage, resilience, growth mindset and excellence in the execution of their plans. We bring tier 1B-schools know-how and Fortune 500 companies international operational experience, building strong relationships with founders, rolling our sleeves and working side by side with them from MVP launch to market-product fit and scaling up, preparing them for series A and beyond.
